title: Drawing, "Design for Brooch in Shape of a Feather", late 18th century
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Feather positioned vertically and curving to the right at the top with a small knot around the shaft.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Brooch in Shape of a Feather", late 18th century.
late 18th century. Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-804.
